Room.Name: Passage Over the Cyclops Den
Room.ShortDescription: The passage stops abruptly at a cliff overlooking the Cyclops Den.
Room.LongDescription: It looks like the Cyclops dug too high and broke through this passage. The mystical, yet deadly, creature is rumored to have a number of good weapons and other stashes of treasure. The only way to get down there is to repel down.
